snippet: Harvard University has retained the top spot in the annual Academic Ranking of World Universities, a position it has held for the past 12 years.

byline.original: By THE INTERNATIONAL NEW YORK TIMES

lead_paragraph: Harvard University has retained the top spot in the annual Academic Ranking of World Universities, a position it has held for the past 12 years.

headline.main: Harvard Keeps Top Spot in Global University Ranking
headline.print_headline: Harvard Keeps Top Spot in University Ranking
